code: @Test public void testShutdownSedaAndDirectEndpoint() throws Exception {     MockEndpoint bar = getMockEndpoint("mock:bar").     bar.expectedMessageCount(5).     template.sendBody("seda:foo", "A").     template.sendBody("seda:foo", "B").     template.sendBody("seda:foo", "C").     template.sendBody("seda:foo", "D").     template.sendBody("seda:foo", "E").     context.stop().     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("seda:foo").startupOrder(1).to("direct:bar").             from("direct:bar").delay(25).to("mock:bar").         }     }. }
